alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 4:46AM HST until December 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF BIG ISLAND AND MAUI COUNTY INCLUDING HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... .Strong trade winds will be especially strong through Friday, especially where the terrain accelerates the flow. Strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Kahoolawe, Lanai, Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
